item.A:
译 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 譯
to translate; to interpret
翻译 (翻譯) fānyì to translate; to interpret; translator; interpreter; translation; interpretation
gōngsī public and private (interests, initiative etc)

traditional: 公私合營
gōngsīhéyíng joint public private operation

traditional: 國際私法
guójìsīfǎ conflict of laws

traditional: 大公無私
dàgōngwúsī just and fair

traditional: 無私
wúsī selfless
sīxìa in private
sīshì personal matters
sīrén private (citizen); private
sīyǒu private; privately owned
sīyǒuzhì private ownership of property
sīfǎ private law

traditional: 私營
sīyíng privately-owned; private
sīzì (adv) secretly; privately; without explicit approval
sīcáng secret store; a stash (of contraband)
sītōng amour
zìsī selfish; selfishness
zìsīzìlì (saying) selfish
zǒusī smuggle

traditional: 戰鬥
zhàndòu to fight; to battle

zhàndòulì fighting strength
zhàndǒulì fighting strength

traditional: 戰鬥員

traditional: 戰鬥機

traditional: 批鬥

traditional: 決鬥
juédòu duel

traditional: 爭鬥

traditional: 鬥志

traditional: 鬥爭意志

traditional: 鬥私批修
